did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.physdesc: This collection consists of four items in part of one Hollinger box (1 folder).
did.abstract: This collection consists of two letters and transcripts of each letter.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Oliver H. Chalker papers, Collection #2082, Special Collections, Carrier Library, James Madison University, Harrisonburg, Va.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains two letters: one dated March 8, 1864, from "Camp near Orange C. H., Va." signed "Jim Wommack" and addressed "Dear Mother and Father;" the second letter is dated November 26, 1864, from Camp Ramsaur [?], signed "R. A. Wommack" and addressed to "John Mikel, Esq. Dear Father." This second letter has an envelope addressed to "John Mikel, Esq., Clemmonsville, Davidson Coun[ty], N.C." Also included are a transcript of the first letter, provided by the donor, and a transcript of the second letter done by the Library.
